QAData.question: Who won between Crystal Palace and Liverpool on Sat, 09 Dec 2023 12:30:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Liverpool won 2–1 over Crystal Palace on Sat, 09 Dec 2023 12:30:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Nathaniel Clyne has the least touches (27) of any outfield player.
Virgil van Dijk completed the most passes (90) in the match.
Mohamed Salah was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.4.
Odsonne Edouard is the most accurate passer (100%) in the match.
Trent Alexander-Arnold created the most chances (6) in the match.
Luis Diaz lost the most duels (9) in the match.
Jarell Quansah committed a foul leading to a penalty for Crystal Palace.
